titles.title: NEPA Accountability and Oversight Act of 2020
NEPA Accountability and Oversight Act of 2020
A bill to amend the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 to impose time limits on the completion of certain required actions under the Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
NEPA Accountability and Oversight Act of 2020
This bills establishes deadlines for federal agencies to complete reviews of the environmental effects of proposed major federal actions.
